MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY13 postcode area of Whitchurch, affecting properties in Coton and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:45PM. Our engineers have arrived  on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:53PM on 19th October 2020
